channel.title: How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done? Like you will k
channel.description:
How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done? Like you will keep doing the animation until you logout, So how do I fix this?
Im trying to make it work when you click an object you do an animation, but you keep doing it. How do I make it so you only do it one time?
How can I make emotes only show one time instead of it going and going and going.

item.title: How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done? Like you will k
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

Then where would I put resetanimation…

Lets say I want the person to stop the animation right after the emote is done. And the animation starts from clicking an object.

Read full topic
